casebody.data:
(February 17, 1955.)

(Republished.)

Jacob Goodman & Co., Inc., Appellant, v. New York Telephone Company et al., Respondents.

Orders unanimously affirmed, without costs. See Goodman é Co. V. New Torh Tel. Co. (ante, p. 404) decided simultaneously herewith. Present — Cohn, J. P., Callahan, Breitel and Botein, JJ. [See ante, p. 879, post, pp. 943-944.]
